original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 796: Homebrew, I’m More of a Whopper Guy
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and David Ruggles chat with John Britton and Mike McQuaid about Homebrew! Thats the missing package manager for macOS; and Workbrew, the commercial offering built on top of it. We cover lots of territory, like why the naming scheme sounds like it was conceived during a pub visit, how Workbrew helps businesses actually use Homebrew, and why you might even want to run Homebrew on a Linux machine!
